#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int pencils[110], kids[110];

int main() {
	int t; scanf("%d", &t);
	int c = 1;
	while(t--) {
		int n; scanf("%d", &n);
		for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			scanf("%d", &kids[i]);
		for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			scanf("%d", &pencils[i]);
		sort(kids, kids + n);
		sort(pencils, pencils + n);
		int ans = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			ans += abs(kids[i] - pencils[i]);
		printf("Case %d: %d\n", c++, ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
